title: Circle secures conditional registration in France under DASP rules
description:
Stablecoin issuer Circle announced on Dec. 21 that it had received conditional registration under France’s cryptocurrency laws. Dante Disparte, Circle’s Chief Strategy Officer and Head of Global Policy, said: “The selection of France as our European regulatory base builds on the country’s clear rules for responsible innovation in fintech and digital assets, while leveraging France’s […]

The post Circle secures conditional registration in France under DASP rules appeared first on CryptoSlate.
